name: ne2geojson
description: This is a simple module to download shapefile from Natural Earth and convert them to GeoJSON in order to use for UNVT.

scripts.build: npm run tiles && npm run extract && npm run style
scripts.tiles: node src/index.js download $(pwd)/data $(pwd)/define.json | node src/index.js convert | tippecanoe --no-feature-limit --no-tile-size-limit --force --simplification=2 --maximum-zoom=5 --base-zoom=5 --hilbert --output=tiles.mbtiles

author: Jin IGARASHI
